title: Greg 'Opie' Hughes
description:
Matt heads up to Santa Rosa, CA with Opie, for a memorial for Chef Carl put on by Guy Fieri. During the weekend, we decided to cruise down to the famous Marhshall Store to get some Point Reyes Oysters. We talk Tesla, Opie's fear of being a passenger, driving down PCH, old cars on the side of the road, and more! 
More from the Opie Radio Podcast here! 
https://opieradio.com/listen-to-opie-radio-podcast/

This podcast is available as a video! Get it at: https://youtu.be/EisJZNi3jho
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
